name: SushiVR
description:
SushiVR is a VR game that operator a sushi shop.
Many people gather in your shop to eat “sushi” that represents Japanese traditional food.
You hold sushi according to the customer’s order and sell as much sushi as possible in time.
Became a general at a sushi restaurant and enjoy quick play. Enjoy!

Feature:

Simple game system
Have you ever eaten sushi?
So, we don't have to explain how to make sushi ! Right?

Best for first time Virtual Reality
You can make sushi with a very intuitive operation.
Even those who play VR games for the first time can easily play it !

Deliver customers within the time limit !
Let's aim for high sales within the time limit of 3 minutes !
